description: Very light on the nose, this bottling offers aromas of wet cement, apple, lime skin and a hint of flint. There is decent acid and texture to the sip, where light flavors of pome fruit and tangy lemon show.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Tangy pear, lime skins and lemongrass aromas show on the nose of this bottling. There is a decent tension to the palate, where Bartlett pear and soda-like flavors of 7-Up arise.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Well done in a light, refreshing style, this medium-bodied wine offers tangy green-apple aromas, fresh citrus and herb flavors and good nervy acidity.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: A light spearmint aroma and lively, subtle spiced-apple flavors make this medium-bodied wine very engaging. It has good lively acidity, a sense of freshness and a clean tangy finish.

name: Terlato 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Very light in the glass with the slightest hint of pink, this wine's aromas are very shy, with just a hint of apple flesh. It's quite zippy and refreshing on the palate, but the flavors are also light, with hints of apple and lemon skin.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Rich fig and almond flavors follow a floral aroma in this full-bodied and mouth-filling wine. Melon, mineral and consommé notes add complexity while the generous texture coats the tongue and creates a lingering finish.

name: Borsao 2016 Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
description: Light citrus aromas and tangy apple flavors give this light-bodied wine a lively personality. From a long-time value-oriented brand, it has good fruit acidity, very fresh fruit flavor nuances and a crisp, clean finish.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Lightly scented, this informal, light-bodied white opens with whiffs of white spring flower and orchard fruit. The fresh, simple palate suggests white peach and a hint of citrus rind.

name: McManis 2018 Estate Grown Certified Sustainable Pinot Grigio (River Junction)
description: Hints of yellow apple and pear are marked by savory, earthen tones in this light-bodied Pinot Grigio. It's moderate in concentration but offers fresh acidity and a dry, easygoing palate.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light rose gold in the glass, this wine offers a fresh orchard-fruit aroma, with a riper notion of peach underscored by white blossoms. The palate is less flourished, yet still boasts rounded apple and pear flavors that are balanced by a shot of tangerine acidity.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light-bodied and simple, this has subdued aromas suggesting mature orchard fruit. Reflecting the nose, the informal palate evokes ripe yellow pear and a hint of dried pineapple before abruptly finishing on a bitter note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This medium-bodied wine has mild fruit aromas, a very soft texture and fruity, almost sugary flavors. It's a straightforward sipper that could be good for a crowd.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: Lightly scented, this opens with aromas of ripe pear and green apple. The aromas follow over to the soft, juicy palate along with a hint of Alpine herb.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Aromas of honeysuckle, green apple and citrus lead the nose. On the simple palate, fresh acidity accompanies pineapple and lemon zest.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of orange blossoms, lemon peels and yellow apples are pleasant on the nose. The palate offers ripe orange, lime juice and lime leaves, but the dry finish is astringent and sweeps away those juicy citrus flavors.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Straw colored in the glass, this Pinot Grigio has aromas of citrus blossom, white flowers and lemon rind. In the mouth, there are flavors of green apple, pear and white peach. It is well balanced and has a crisp finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: White spring flower and orchard fruit aromas mingle together in the glass. It's round and juicy, offering mature yellow pear and a hint of banana.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Very fruity and fresh, this light-bodied wine shows vivid floral and apple aromas and flavors. It's attractively clean, snappy and straightforward.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Mouthwatering aromas of baked apple, ripe white peach and Bartlett pear follow over to the juicy palate alongside tangy acidity. It closes crisp and clean.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: A slightly pink shade of yellow in the glass, this fresh bottling offers aromas of red apple and citrus spray on the nose. The mouthfeel is rounded and smooth, carrying flavors of peach, lime zest and a touch of salinity.

name: Volpe Pasini 2017 Zuc di Volpe Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas evoking toasted oak and yellow stone fruit mingle with a whiff of crushed rock. The round, brawny palate offers toast, ripe peach, baked apple and tangerine alongside a salty mineral note.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Clean aromas of pear flesh, citrus skins and creamy white fruit show on the nose of this bottling. Broad flavors of poached pome fruit are cut by tangy grapefruit elements, proving quite complex for an often simple grape.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Bright fresh fruit flavors with some good depth highlight this attractive medium-bodied wine. It balances ripeness with crispness and has a lingering fruity finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Baked pear, yellow apple and mature white peach aromas follow over to the ripe, medium-bodied palate. A ginger note accents the dry, fruity finish.

name: Eden Rift 2018 Terraces Pinot Gris (Cienega Valley)
description: Honeysuckle and tropical fruit aromas lead the nose of this savory white. Smooth and juicy, the enveloping palate doles out honeydew melon, cantaloupe and baking spice alongside a hint of tangy citrus.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: This opens with enticing scents of honeysuckle, ripe orchard fruit and a whiff of beeswax. The enveloping palate doles out juicy yellow pear, creamy white peach and a hint of citrus, while a mineral note brightens the finish.

name: Chaddsford 2016 CFW Pinot Grigio (Pennsylvania)
description: Tire rubber aromas are at the fore, follow by notes of stone fruit and pineapple. A smoky palate follows, with mesquite notes on the finish.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Grass and white fruit aromas lead to a soft, flabby palate that lacks acidity. Flavors of melon and grass finish short.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This straw-colored Pinot Grigio from Romania has aromas of lemon pith, citrus blossom and apricot. In the mouth there are flavors of lemon-lime, peach and melon before the crisp, clean finish.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: There are aromas of citrus blossom, white flower and peach in this Romanian Pinot Grigio. On the palate there are flavors of lemon pith and white melon with a crisp finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Apolloni produces both a Pinot Gris and a Pinot Grigio. While made of the same grape, they are produced in a different style. This one is done in all stainless, though the differences between the two styles seem to center more on ripeness than on vessel. A light tree-fruit tone shows on the nose and palate, giving this a pleasant, simple nature.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Aromas of mineral and white fruit start this off. The tangy palate shows some zest and pop, while this tastes like citrus, melon and apple. Drink now.

name: Joseph Cattin 2017 Hatschbourg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: Thick, rich and robust in peach, apricot and stone, this is made in a big viscous style with present ripeness.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Bright, fresh and balanced, this is a fruity white with bold flavors of baked peach and apricot. A nutty undertone adds a touch of richness and texture.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Vineyard-designated offerings of this variety are an extreme rarity in the state. Citrus, green apple, herb and wilted flower aromas predominate. The palate is light in style, with a textured feel.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: An unmistakable aroma of buttered toast marks this full-bodied wine, even before the flavors bring on more toast, light char and a slight astringency in the texture. It makes for a rather severe character overall.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This bold and candy-like wine smells toasty and buttery, tastes like butter and butterscotch and has an earthy edge too.

name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Quite closed up apple aromas are followed by smoky, medium-bodied flavors. It doesn't all work.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This medium-bodied wine is nicely fruity, uncomplicated and easy to sip. It has green-apple aromas, light citrus flavors and a good balance between fresh acidity and ripeness.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Concentrated, dry and rather full bodied, this substantive wine offers green-apple and floral aromas, ripe apple and kiwi flavors and a soothing mouthfilling texture.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: This light-bodied wine is restrained and subtle, starting with a virtually transparent color, then followed by tight apple and pine aromas and tangy, orange-peel and gooseberry flavors. Bolstered with 20% other varieties blended in, this is a refreshing, dry wine.

name: Carlton Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: This is a soft and creamy-textured wine, with a mix of light fig, mineral and apple flavors. It's not a fruit bomb, but more of a textural wine that is soothing and easy to enjoy.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Showing good character and substance, this medium-bodied wine stands out from the pack of bland Pinot Grigios thanks to its light, earthy aroma. The palate brings full-fledged flavors of white cherry and peach, with hints of flowers that add interest. The texture is firm enough, but also rich and mouthfilling.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Nearly clear in the glass, this bottling smells of bright pear, key lime and a bit of jasmine on the nose. The palate is clean, easy and refreshing, offering simple apple and pear flavors.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Aromas of white flower, peach and tangerine are accented by a whiff of beer hops in this easy-drinking white. It's perfumed aromatics are a touch cloying, but the palate is dry and brisk. Enjoy now.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Elegant and well balanced, this smooth and supple wine has just the right equilibrium between fresh appley flavors, brisk acidity and a good touch of viscosity for a smooth mouthfeel and finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Loads of pollen and orange-blossom honey are touched with spice on this extremely pungent nose. This is surprisingly dry with bitter lime through out, along with flavors of lemon juice and golden apple. There is a floral note towards the finish ending on navel orange. The nose and palate are totally disconnected and there is a war between grasping astringency and mouthwatering acidity.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This is golden in color. White pepper, pollen, freshly cut grass and hay are joined by apricot skins and a subtle almond tone on the nose. Zippy zesty acidity is a little sour on the palate, in flavors of lemon pith, ripe apple, river rocks and almond. There is bitter lemon on the finish, with a slight nuttiness.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Peach, dried flowers, candied lemon peel and apple skin turn a little soapy on the nose. The palate is nice and light with fresh acidity and flavors of key lime and green apple. The apple turns tart on the finish, with a touch of lemon zest.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This easygoing rosato has subdued aromas suggesting orchard fruit and a whiff of spring flower. The simple palate offers apple and tangy citrus alongside refreshing acidity.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Pungent ripe pear aromas are wreathed in flowers and Honeycrisp apples, along with a touch of sweet cinnamon on the nose. The palate is reminiscent of freshly pressed apple juice with a squeeze of lemon. There is more of an apple-peel tone to the finish along with lime oil.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This copper colored Pinot Grigio has aromas of orchard fruit and a whiff of spring wildflower. On the bright, straightforward palate, you'll find suggestions of apple and pink grapefruit alongside fresh acidity.

name: Tamarack Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: A deep, rusty-orange color, this has a savory aroma of cranberry, cherry, spicy frankincense and dried rose. The palate is surprisingly light in concentration with flavors of lemon peels, yellow cherry, white tea and dried rose. Lightly tannic, ample acidity carries the skin contact well, keeping this surprisingly light on its feet. There is a hint of spice on the finish.

name: Anaya 2017 Potrero Vineyards Pinot Gris (Clements Hills)
description: Orange blossoms, key lime pie, guava peel and mango sorbet aromas show on the rich and ripe nose of this bottling. There's a touch of sweetness to the sip, where plump flavors of mango, tangerine and orange blossom ride a creamy mouthfeel.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Yellow-apple and white-flower aromas team up with white-pepper spice on the nose of this cheerful Pinot Grigio. A juicy palate of peaches and apples with lime juice and clementine is full of vibrant tingling acidity. This is lovely, finishing on ripe apple, with lemon acidity lingering prettily.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: A mineral nose of crushed marble is accented with light hints of lemon and white peach on this juicy and delightful wine. Slippery in feel, the palate conveys ripe apple and lemon juice with some grassy notes, as well as pear and river rock tones. The lime juice and crushed mineral finish lingers long.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: This opens with aromas of white spring flower and white stone fruit. It's light bodied and extremely simple, with green-apple flavors.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Grapefruit and pyrazine aromas lead to a tart, citrusy palate. Sharp, tangy flavors of tangerine and lemon are on the sour side, while this finishes lean and juicy, with pronounced acidity and not much fruit character.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light peach and apple aromas and crisp flavors make this medium-bodied wine lively and appetizing. It tastes nicely dry, clean and fresh.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This copper-colored Pinot Grigio has aromas of spring blossom and green apple. The green-apple aroma carries on to the light informal palate along with white peach and fresh acidity.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: Fresh and light bodied, this easygoing wine has flavors suggesting honeydew melon and pear. It's simple but well made.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Tropical fruit and spring blossom aromas lead the nose on this informal white. The extremely simple palate offers green apple and a hint of green melon alongside zesty acidity.

name: Laurelwood 2017 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: Clean, light and straightforward, this medium- bodied wine has mild melon and apple flavors and a rather soft texture.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This simple, copper-colored Pinot Grigio has aromas and flavors of mature orchard fruit and tangy citrus. It closes on a the merest hint of baking spice.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Beeswax and orchard-fruit aromas lead the nose. On the tangy palate, fresh acidity lifts mature apple and chamomile. It's simple but well made.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: This opens with aromas of honey suckle and exotic fruit. The fruity aromas carry on to the short, simple palate along with yellow apple and a candied note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Clay and mineral aromas, mild fig flavors and medium body give this smooth-textured wine an attractive but subdued character.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Petroleum jelly, flint, Muscat gummy and green apple aromas are followed by tart, lively kiwi flavors. It provides a lot of value and appeal.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Partly fermented in oak barrels, this offers delicate aromas suggesting toasted hazelnut and white stone fruit. The elegant linear palate offers ripe Anjou pear and creamy peach before closing on a light almond note.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: You'll find aromas of mature orchard fruit and a whiff of hazelnut on this rounded white. Reflecting the nose, the medium-bodied palate offers ripe apple, pear and a hint of bitter almond on the close.

name: Barton & Guestier 2018 Réserve Sauvignon Blanc (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: This opens with delicate aromas of spring wildflower and white stone fruit. The fresh, easy-drinking palate offers yellow apple, honeydew and a hint of citrus.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: White stone fruit, spring field flower and a whiff of beeswax waft out of the glass. It's round and tangy, doling out white peach, green melon and a hint of tangerine.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Spring blossom and pear aromas lead the nose on this bright medium-bodied white. The round savory palate offers creamy apple and an almond note alongside refreshing acidity.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Crisp and refreshing, this has aromas of ripe orchard fruit and spring wildflower. The bright palate evokes yellow pear and green melon before a tangy finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of spring blossom and white stone fruit set the tone. On the light-bodied, linear palate, tangy acidity lifts ripe yellow pear and Meyer lemon before a white-almond close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Bright and medium bodied, this offers aromas of ripe white stone fruit. On the structured palate, fresh acidity accompanies ripe Bartlett pear and mature apple before a slightly nutty finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Delicate scents evoking ripe apple, hazelnut and honeysuckle come together on this. It's fresh and polished, offering creamy yellow pear, nectarine and lemon flavors.

name: Alexana 2018 Terroir Series Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: Aromas of French oak, coconut and citrus lead the nose. The oak sensations carry over to the rounded full-bodied palate along with mature yellow-apple skin, grapefruit and mineral notes.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This savory white opens with aromas of peach blossom and ripe white stone fruit. The medium-bodied palate doles out creamy pear, honeydew melon and tangy acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of white stone fruit mingle with whiffs of spring field flower. The juicy palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, yellow apple and green melon before an almond close. Bright acidity lifts the finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Made in both steel and cask, this opens with aromas of ripe white stone fruit, oak and hazelnut. Its round and full-bodied palate offers mature yellow apple and almond before a lemon-drop finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Inviting aromas of ripe orchard fruit, hazelnut, dried herb and bread dough come together on this medium-bodied white. The rounded elegant palate offers creamy apple, grapefruit and flinty mineral while tangy acidity freshens the finish.

name: Volpe Pasini 2017 Zuc di Volpe Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of ripe orchard fruit, spring flower and a yeasty whiff of bread dough form the inviting nose. The savory, rounded palate offers creamy white peach, apple and a hint of wet stone alongside tangy acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Enticing aromas of white stone fruit and yellow spring flower waft out of the glass. It's round and generous, doling out Bartlett pear, nectarine and a hint of citrus. Tangy acidity lifts the juicy fruit flavors before a white-almond close.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Enticingly delicate scents of spring blossom, Granny Smith apple and a whiff of crushed stone shape the nose. The medium-bodied palate shows finesse and freshness, offering ripe pear and honeydew alongside bright acidity. A flinty note signals the finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This fragrant, savory wine opens with aromas of white stone fruit, yellow wildflower and a whiff of hazelnut. It's medium bodied and juicy, doling out ripe Bartlett pear and creamy apple alongside a tangy mineral note. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: This has enticing aromas of fragrant spring blossom and ripe white stone fruit. It's creamy and enveloping, doling out mature yellow pear, Rennet apple and lemon drop before a white-almond finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: White spring flower, honeydew melon and yellow stone-fruit aromas lead the way on this savory white. The creamy full-bodied palate also shows elegance and freshness, offering yellow apple, ripe peach, lemon drop and mineral before a white-almond finish. Tangy acidity brightens the rich flavors.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Here's a bright simple white for everyday that offers suggestions of Granny Smith apple, honeydew melon and citrus. Fresh acidity gives it a juicy close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of soda water, peach and melon lead to broad, dry, slightly viscous fruit flavors. It's an unusual interpretation of this variety.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: An atypical variety for such a southern region, this Pinot Grigio shows some semblance to its brethren in the north, with apple, citrus and blossom tones, yet its missing all of the vibrancy and verve from a lack of acidity. Nevertheless, it's a perfectly clean and simple drink.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Another clean and tasty bottling from this label's numbered series, this shows light nectarine and lemon aromas on the nose. The texture is grippy and bright in acidity, offering crunchy Asian pear flavors that prove quite refreshing, with decent length.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Delicately scented, this opens with aromas of white flower and a whiff of orchard fruit. The fresh palate offers lemon and pear alongside bright acidity and a tangy hint of crushed oyster shell.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of white flower and ripe orchard fruit lead the way. The creamy palate doles out crisp apple, Bartlett pear and a hint of lemon zest alongside fresh acidity. It closes clean and crisp.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Aromas of citrus blossom, white stone fruit and a whiff of wet flint float from the glass. Fresh and savory, the juicy palate delivers ripe Bartlett pear, yellow apple, nectarine and lemon drop alongside bright acidity. Notes of almond and ginger add depth.

name: Cardwell Hill 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: White spring blossom and citrus aromas waft out of the glass. On the palate, crisp acidity brightens creamy apple, pear and tangerine zest. It's quite simply crisp and delicious.

name: Holm Oak 2017 Pinot Gris (Tasmania)
description: This wine is intensely floral and gritty on the palate, showing a fleshy cloying sense of ripeness. Melon, pear and fig highlight the fruit profile.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This is a light-bodied wine, with mild fruity aromas and lean, herbaceous flavors. It's straightforward, low in alcohol and refreshing.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This light-bodied wine has honeydew melon and cucumber aromas, subtle fruit flavors and a smooth soft texture. It's easy to sip and is low in acidity.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light green-apple aromas and crisp, almost neutral flavors leave this wine with a bland personality. It is dry and clean on the palate.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: The aromas of this full-bodied sweet-seeming wine are floral and honey-like, followed by rich ripe honeydew melon and peach-syrup flavors and a soft mouth-clinging texture. It's not the usual style, but tasty in its own right.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Apple, melon and a touch of vanilla give a tasty spectrum of aromas and flavors to this medium-bodied wine. It's light enough to sip easily but has a bit of depth to the flavors that makes it interesting.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Fruity in flavor and nicely rounded in texture, this medium-bodied wine from Napa-based Mason Cellars incorporates grapes from around the state. It has a good balance between lively acidity and rather ripe apple and melon flavors.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light fresh aromas and flavors along with decent balance make this wine a versatile drink. The flavors are faint but clean, so it makes a good palate cleanser and should work well for a crowd.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Lively lemon and herb aromas and bright, vivid grapefruit flavors make this an eye-opening dry wine. It has plenty of good fruit acidity to whet the appetite for appetizers and seafood.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Crisp in a very good way, this wine has lively lemon and green-apple aromas, flavors that are a bit riper than that and a texture that's smooth without giving up a little nip of acidity. The wine has great balance, light body and a high refreshment quotient.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: This balanced and restrained wine has delicious fruit flavors that slowly emerge on the palate. Light peach and apricot nuances ride on a lightly tart note for a mouth-cleansing effect. Enjoy as an apéritif.

name: Armand Hurst 2017 Brand Sélection de Grains Nobles Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: Lovely golden color highlights a balanced, floral and pretty late-harvest expression of apricot jam in this nuanced wine, which is relatively low in alcohol with 12.3% residual sugar. It offers viscosity that doesn't overpower, making it ideal for pairing with hard pungent cheeses or vanilla ice cream.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Traces of yellow peach mingle into fresh herbs and green plums in this delicately concentrated Pinot Grigio. Medium bodied in style, with soft, yielding acidity, it's a quiet but pleasing wine.

name: Anaya 2017 Potrero Vineyards Pinot Gris (Clements Hills)
description: Very light in the glass, this wine shows fresh honeydew aromas along with sweet peach, honeysuckle and slightly tart orange rinds. The easy simple flavors include peach and ripe apple.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Briny aromas of seashell include notes of petrol and motor oil. A watery palate is just O.K., while this tastes barely of fruit in front of a bitter-leaning finish.

name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: If you're looking for a basic white quaffing wine that's priced to sell but won't wow, this is it. Oily aromas of almond skins come with hints of apple and pear. Modest acidity and nutty, yeasty flavors of salt and bitter melon finish with signs of early oxidation.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Floral, this wine offers voluptuously sizable weight and body around a soft texture of lasting acidity. The fruit leans tartly into grapefruit and lime.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Bright aromas of lime, pear and crushed chalk rise to the nose atop a slight bit of effervescence in this latest release from the actress Drew Barrymore. The sip is bright and playful with lots of fun energy and a compelling texture, proving easy to quaff if simple overall.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: This wine is two-thirds Evergreen and one-third RAF vineyards, both in the Ancient Lakes appellation and all fermented and aged in stainless steel. It's spot on for the variety, with notes of whole Granny Smith apple and green melon. The palate redolent with sleek fresh apple and pear flavors that power through the finish. It's a standout at this price.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This is an opulent style dripping with buttered toast, ripe pear, flint and green vegetal notes. The palate is soft and creamy but not without acidity. It's hard not to get sucked into the glass.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This light-bodied wine has a lively, slightly spritzy texture and lots of vivid canteloupe and peach flavors accented by earth and white pepper. It's definitely better than your average neutral-tasting Pinot Grigio.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of lemon zest and Granny Smith apple carry the nose and lead the way to a palate of lemon curd and more green apple.

name: McManis 2018 Estate Grown Certified Sustainable Pinot Grigio (River Junction)
description: Semisweet and very fruity, this easy-drinking wine has floral peachy aromas and flavors and a soft texture with just enough of a citrus component to keep it lively.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: This is a refreshing, palate-cleansing wine that blends crisp apple and white peach flavors on a tangy texture that's supported by good acidity. It's light bodied and appetizing.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: This wine gets its charm from a refreshing mouthfeel and clean light flavors rather than from richness or concentration. It is light bodied, tangy and well balanced.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Flavorful and unusually gutsy for the varietal, this wine has almost meaty aromas, lots of grape-skin and grapefruit flavors on the palate and a sense of density the comes from a little tannin in the texture.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This Pinot Grigio offers aromas of lemon grass and lime pith that lead to flavors of grapefruit, and honeydew melon before the clean finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine is clean, crisp and tasty. Aromas of honey, lime peel and rounded mango lead into a palate that's zippy in bright acidity and grippy in structure. Racy mandarin zest, yellow melon and wet stone flavors carry the palate.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: This is an extremely fresh, vibrant and lovely wine that should be enjoyed in its utter youth. Clean, chalky and stony aromas of crushed oyster shells, wet shaved marble and the lightest hints of nectarine lead into a racy, mouthwatering palate of wet concrete, grapefruit rind and Gravenstein apple flesh.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This wine is light-bodied and very straightforward in flavor, showing modest apple and citrus aromas and equally light flavors. It feels soft on the palate and carries a hint of sweetness.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Mild white-fruit aromas are generic. This is a lighter-bodied patio white wine with tropical tang. Citrusy flavors are both lean and mild, while this delivers just enough snap on the tail end.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Punchy aromas of citrus fruits set up a simple but snappy palate. Tangy citrus flavors give this light-bodied white a sense of freshness. On the finish, a hint of salt blends with lingering citrus notes.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: Powdery white-fruit aromas are friendly. This is honest on the palate, with some acidic kick and a touch of body weight. Kiwi, lychee and citrus flavors end with a peppery note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of lemon and pear drop are of medium intensity on the nose. The palate has an appealing stoniness and a lasting flavor of lemon curd. Bright acidity offers a long, zippy finish.

name: Tamarack Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: This wine's subdued exotic fruit and acacia flower aromas lift out of the glass. The rounded, fruity palate offers mature pear and ripe honeydew melon flavors while a banana note marks the close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Honey, pear blossom, banana and honeydew aromas make for a fairly reserved but clean nose on this bottling, Bright acidity leads the palate, where ripe Asian pear, lemon bar and guava flavors provide decent verve.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: This light-bodied wine balances fresh ripe fruit aromas and flavors against good crisp acidity. It has a refreshing mouthfeel that's partly rich and partly tart, and a very clean finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This wine's nose is rather shy but eventually reveals a whiff of spring flower. The simple palate offers mature apple, pear and beeswax notes alongside fresh acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine's intense honeysuckle, jasmine and ripe green apple aromas leap out of the glass. The green apple note carries over to the palate, along with honeydew melon and citrus. Fresh acidity and a hint of mineral lift the fruity flavors.

name: California Roots 2016 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This wine's subdued aromas of white spring flower and ripe orchard fruit emerge in the glass. Reflecting the nose, the bright palate offers green apple, white peach and citrus notes. It has a clean, juicy finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine's honeysuckle, hawthorn and honeydew melon aromas take center stage while the medium-bodied palate offers green apple, citrus and white peach notes. Fresh acidity brightens the fruity flavors.

name: Volpe Pasini 2017 Zuc di Volpe Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine's delicate bouquet of white flowers and ripe orchard fruit floats from the glass. The elegant palate delivers white peach, citrus and honeydew melon flavors alongside fresh acidity. A lightly savory mineral note lifts the finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Heady aromas of pear, beeswax and white spring flower take center stage in this lovely white. The medium-bodied palate doles out white peach, citrus and almond flavors, with fresh acidity.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Ripe orchard fruit, acacia and toast aromas lead the nose of this wine. It's round and full-bodied, offering mature yellow apple, ripe Bartlett pear and bitter almond flavors alongside tangy acidity. Drink through 2019.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Honeydew melon and tropical fruit aromas lead the nose of this wine. The rounded, medium-bodied palate doles out white peach, nectarine zest and steely mineral notes alongside fresh acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Yellow stone fruit, citrus blossom and tropical fruit aromas take center stage in this wine. The creamy palate delivers honeydew melon, white peach and juicy nectarine flavors, alongside tangy acidity. A mineral note gives it a savory close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine's floral and fruity honeysuckle, citrus and green apple aromas practically jump out of the glass. The juicy, medium-bodied palate doles out ripe Granny Smith apple, Bartlett pear and tangerine flavors, alongside a hint of crushed stone. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: A fruit bowl of pineapple, peach and watermelon, this is a simple, dry drop that doesn't show much in the way of character or pizazz but won't offend either.

name: Eden Rift 2018 Terraces Pinot Gris (Cienega Valley)
description: Structured and savory, this opens with ripe orchard fruit, Alpine herb and toasted oak aromas. The full-bodied palate doles out ripe Anjou pear, pineapple, ginger and citrus zest flavors while a mineral note enwraps the finish. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors.

name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Lemon and grapefruit notes are slightly overwhelmed by vegetal ones: tomato leaf, lettuce and wet green leaves. The palate is crisp but balanced with a touch of residual sugar.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Heady aromas of fragrant spring flower and orchard fruit leap out of the glass. On the bright, simple palate, fresh acidity accompanies green apple and citrus notes.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: A rather obvious but likable wine, this has heady aromas of ripe peaches and pears, apple skins and flowers. The palate shows a little residual sugar but overall it's a mostly dry style with a slightly waxy texture. Knock this back with Chinese egg rolls and lo mein.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This is a simple, citrusy stone-fruited sipper with something a little chemical, like lemon-scented furniture polish, swirling around. Nevertheless, the palate is balanced and dry with crisp acidity and very slight fruit weight.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: In a sea of nondescript Pinot Grigios, this shows some varietal character and interest, especially for the affordable price. The nose is appley and honeyed with ripe apricot fruit and pits, pineapple rind and almond paste. It's drier than expected on the palate considering the honeyed nose, and texturally on the oily side, veering into medium-body territory. Drink with spicy Asian cuisine.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Quite clear in the glass, this bottling from the Goodchild Vineyard shows soft peach, tangerine and a slightly vinous aroma on the nose. The palate offers citrus and tangy apple skins.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This bottling shows candied honeysuckle and pear extract on the nose. It's simple, fresh and easy-to-like on the palate, full of yellow apples, red pears and a decent acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: So pale in color it could be mistaken for water! And it's almost as easy to drink as well. (A dangerous combo!) On the nose, delicate aromas of apples, almonds, white-pepper spice and some leafy undertones thread nicely into the palate which is crisp and prickly with a chalky texture.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This is a zesty and fruit-forward wine, offering crisp green-apple and grapefruit flavors marked by hints of spice and musk. It's a straightforward yet refreshingly fruity wine to enjoy now.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This light-bodied white opens with fruity aromas of banana and honeydew melon that follow over to the fresh informal palate along with a hint of Granny Smith apple. It's simple but well made.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This is a light-bodied wine with honest, straightforward and rather light fruit flavors and decent balance. An earthy trace in the aroma gets covered with good, moderate apple and kiwi flavors.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: This blush-colored Pinot Grigio opens with aromas of ripe orchard fruit and a whiff of white pepper. The aromas follow over to the simple, informal palate along with fresh acidity.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This simple wine has subdued aromas suggesting orchard fruit and pineapple. Reflecting the nose, the simple palate evokes green apple and white peach.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Very appley, fresh and crisp, this wine is light bodied, clean and appetizing. It gives simple refreshment and there's nothing wrong with that.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This medium-bodied wine has plenty of ripe fruit flavors. Fuji apple and honeydew melon take center stage, with low-acid and a soft texture.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: This informal Pinot Grigio has subdued aromas reminiscent of orchard fruit and white flower. The light-bodied simple palate shows yellow apple and white peach alongside fresh acidity.

name: Anaya 2017 Potrero Vineyards Pinot Gris (Clements Hills)
description: This unusual, deeply colored Pinot Grigio (a result of long skin maceration) opens with subdued aromas evoking raspberry jam and warm toasted notes. The brawny, rather evolved palate offers oak, dried cherries steeped in spirits, coconut and a hint roasted coffee beans. The warmth of evident alcohol throws it off balance. Drink now to capture the remaining freshness.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Fresh and simple, this offers peach, green-apple and citrus flavors. Bright acidity gives it a crisp finish. It's informal and fun and would make a good pour at picnics and large gatherings.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This wine's aromas start off quite reduced, making it hard to perceive the fruit. Its tropical fruit flavors are tart and tangy, with a lemony finish. Once the reduction blows off, it moves up a notch or two.

name: Barefoot NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Lightly scented, this has subdued aromas evoking yellow apple and a whiff of nut. The aromas can be detected on the somewhat diluted, simple palate along with crisp acidity.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: White spring flower and Granny Smith apple aromas carry over to the tangy easy-drinking palate along with suggestions of yellow pear and citrus. It has a clean fresh finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Citrus blossom and white stone-fruit aromas glide out of the glass. The straightforward palate offers green apple and citrus zest while a hint of white almond marks the close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: White stone-fruit and spring-flower aromas lead the nose on this simple white. Reflecting the aromas, the fresh fruity palate offers Granny Smith apple and a hint of white peach.

name: Laurelwood 2017 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: This has subdued aromas suggesting ripe pear, acacia and nut. On the simple light-bodied palate, fresh acidity accompanies yellow-apple skin while a note of bitter almond closes the somewhat lean finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This opens with aromas of jasmine and tropical fruit while the ripe palate offers candied lemon, mature nectarine and dried apricot. Drink soon.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This offers aromas of ripe yellow stone fruit and a whiff of toast lead the nose. The full-bodied mature palate offers dried apricot, yellow-apple skin and a hint of bitter almond. You'll also detect the heat of alcohol on the close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: The nose is rather shy but eventually reveals whiffs of white stone fruit and a floral note. On the medium-bodied palate, fresh acidity lifts yellow apple, pear and a hint of citrus.

name: Tamarack Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: The rather shy nose eventually reveals suggestions of orchard fruit and field flower while the palate evokes mature apricot and yellow apple. A hint of tangerine rind signals the close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of brimstone and mature white stone lead the nose on this straightforward white. On the crisp light-bodied palate, bright acidity lifts mature Rennet apple and citrus zest while a hint of white almond marks the close.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Spring flower, white stone fruit and whiff of almond come together on this. The aromas follow over to the straightforward palate along with a hint of mature green apple.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: White spring flower, stone fruit and a whiff of honey lead the nose. On the straightforward palate, a touch of bitter almond adds interest to yellow apple and a hint of citrus.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Fruity aromas of citrus and green apple drift over to the simple palate along with a hint of green melon. Bright acidity gives it a refreshing finish. It's informal but well made.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This easygoing white opens with aromas of mature apple and a whiff of crushed rock that carry over to the fresh informal palate along with a citrus note. Bright acidity perks up the close.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: Aromas of white almond and mature yellow pear carry over to the medium-bodied straightforward palate along with an apple note. It has a fresh, tangy close.

name: Borsao 2016 Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
description: White spring-flower and orchard-fruit aromas take center stage on this straightforward and enjoyable white. On the bright palate, fresh acidity offsets honeydew melon and green apple. A hint of mineral marks the tangy finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This has a shy nose but eventually gives away whiffs of mature pear a hint of toasted nut while the fresh, if somewhat subdued, palate evokes suggestions of yellow apple. It finishes on a bitter almond note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Subtle aromas of citrus blossom, orchard fruit and a whiff of crushed herb waft out of the glass. It's fresh and straightforward, offering Granny Smith apple and ripe pear flavors.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This offers delicate aromas evoking green apple and citrus that carry over to the straightforward palate along with a hint of pear. It has a fresh clean finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas suggesting fragrant white flower and exotic fruit lead the nose. Full bodied and fruity, the palate offers mature apple and a hint of honeydew melon alongside a white-almond note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This has aromas evoking wild flower, white stone fruit and toasted hazelnut while on the light-bodied, straightforward palate, fresh acidity accompanies baked apple. It closes on a bitter almond note.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of ripe white stone fruit lead the nose. The tangy straightforward palate offers mature yellow apple, Bartlett pear and a note of bitter almond.

name: Anaya 2017 Potrero Vineyards Pinot Gris (Clements Hills)
description: Aromas of oak, toasted nut and a whiff of tropical fruit carry over to the robust palate along with coconut and roasted coffee bean. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit and freshness.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Honeysuckle and green-apple aromas lead the nose. The green-apple note follows over to the medium-bodied palate along with a hint of honeydew melon and citrus zest. It closes on an almond note.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of orchard fruit and yellow spring flower delicately float out of the glass along with a hint of baked bread. On the linear palate, bright acidity frames citrus, beeswax and crushed herb.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of spring flower, beeswax and a whiff of orchard fruit lead the nose. On the round palate, fresh acidity lifts ripe yellow pear, pineapple and honeydew melon.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of yellow peach and tropical fruit emerge from the glass. The straightforward palate offers Golden Delicious apple and nectarine with a tangy refreshing finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of tropical fruit and honeysuckle lead the nose. On the palate, fresh acidity underscores Granny Smith apple and citrus while a hint of white almond marks the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Green-apple and spring blossom aromas lead the nose. The apple note carries over to the tangy palate along with orange zest while a hint of bitter almond marks the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This bright medium-bodied white offers delicately enticing scents of spring wild flower and orchard fruit. On the linear palate, tangy acidity underscores Bartlett pear and juicy tangerine zest while a hint of crushed stone backs up the clean finish.

name: Alexana 2018 Terroir Series Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: The nose is initially quite shy but eventually reveals whiffs of white flower, orchard fruit and a hint of oak-driven spice. On the full-bodied palate, a toasted note accompanies baked yellow apple and a hint of coconut.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Made with grapes cultivated with biodynamic farming methods, this offers aromas of white stone fruit, spring blossom and graphite. The linear palate evokes apple, ripe yellow pear, lemon rind and flint alongside fresh acidity. A hint of toasted nut backs up the finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Spring blossom and mature white stone-fruit aromas lift out of the glass. On the palate, fresh acidity lifts ripe apple and Bartlett pear while a white-almond note marks the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Heady aromas of fragrant spring flower and white stone fruit lift out of the glass. On the ripe rounded palate, fresh acidity brightens baked yellow apple and honeydew melon. It closes on an almond note.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This crisp, straw-colored white wine has interesting touches of complexity in the mineral and prosciutto aromas and the nice combination of savory herb and fresh apple flavors. It's medium bodied and has lively acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of toasted almond, ripe yellow apple and pear carry over to the full-bodied round palate. Just enough fresh acidity brightens the ripe fruit flavors.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Made with extended contact between the grape skins and the must, this copper-colored wine opens with aromas of orchard fruit and spring blossom. The savory palate delivers pink grapefruit, McIntosh apple and tangerine zest alongside fresh acidity.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This opens with subtle aromas of ripe orchard fruit and white spring flower. The lively palate evokes mature Bartlett pear and tangerine zest alongside fresh acidity.

name: Volpe Pasini 2017 Zuc di Volpe Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Oak, coffee and toast aromas lead the nose and carry over the palate along with lemon drop, baked apple and butterscotch. You'll find toasted almond and a subtle hint of alcohol on the close.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Delicate, enticing scents of spring wild flower and ripe pear lead the way on this bright refreshing white. Mirroring the nose, the savory, linear palate delivers apple, tangerine slice and a hint of mineral alongside bright acidity.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Creamy and medium-bodied, this delivers ripe apple, white peach and citrus flavors. Tangy acidity lifts the rich flavors while a hint of toasted hazelnut lingers on the finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Delicate scents reminiscent of white spring flower, Alpine herb and pear appear in the glass. On the bright palate, refreshing acidity accompanies mature apple, peach, wild fennel and citrus. A note of flint gives it a crisp, clean close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of white spring wild flower, green apple and honeydew melon march over to the ripe palate along with citrus and white peach. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced and bright while a white-almond note lingers on the finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Spring blossom and ripe stone-fruit aromas float out of the glass. The fresh rounded palate offers creamy pear and ripe apple. It closes on light hint of almond.

name: Bandit NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas suggesting white spring flower, citrus peel and ripe white peach lead the nose. The tangy linear palate offers juicy tangerine slice and green apple alongside a white-almond note.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This bottling will please many palates, as the very light wine offers cool and crisp aromas of Gala apple, gardenia and scratched pomelo skin. It's clean and crisp on the palate at first, and then come waves of riper yellow-apple and Anjou pear flavors, making it a Pinot Grigio with some body to chew on.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Ripe and juicy, this offers aromas of pressed spring flower and yellow stone fruit. On the bright palate, a note of candied nectarine zest accents ripe yellow apple and dried apricot.

name: Tamarack Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: Round and friendly, this opens with aromas of banana and tropical fruit. The scents carry over to the ripe fruity palate along with yellow apple and a hint of lemon peel.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of yellow stone fruit and banana lead the nose. Bright and straightforward, the palate offers green apple and a nectarine note alongside zesty acidity that gives it a refreshing finish.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: Pretty decent for a 10-spot, with slightly floral aromas, a hint of ginger and underripe pear fruit. It's medium bodied, with a dry, lightly textured, bitter finish. Drink now.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This inexpensive wine is relatively low in alcohol and reasonably refreshing, although pear, melon and pineapple flavors leave a slightly sweet impression on the palate. Drink now.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: With just the tiniest amount of residual sugar, this wine presents as thick and heavy on the palate. A woody, herbal, nutty tone underplays fruitier aspects of peach and pear.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Honeydew melon, just-sliced Gala apple and wet-cement aromas show on the nose of this bottling that starts to take on Jolly Rancher sour-apple scents. The simple palate is round and easy to enjoy, with ripe, slightly sweet green-apple flavors.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Dried lime rinds, wet cement, pear blossoms, honeydew melon and tangerine show on the nose of this bottling that is ever-so-slightly pink in the glass. Honeysuckle flavors meet with ripe pear and apple on the palate that is a tad sweet.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Hints of caramelized sugar lend warmth to this fresh fruity wine full of nectarine and grapefruit flavors. It's rich in body with a luscious, mouthfilling cling off set by sunny tangerine acidity. Enjoy now through 2018.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Smoothness and subtlety come with a texture just rich enough to be interesting, without damping down the acidity that makes this light-bodied wine refreshing. It offers flavors of crisp green apple and a touch of pear.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This simple white opens with aromas of honeysuckle and pear while the easygoing palate offers hints of nectarine and green apple. Fresh acidity gives it a brisk finish. Drink soon.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: A soft mouthfeel and fresh golden delicious apple flavors make this light-bodied wine easy on the palate. It has crisp and clean flavors all the way through.

name: Château d'Auvernier 2015 Pinot Gris (Neuchâtel)
description: This opens with aromas of toasted oak, yellow apple skin and a confectionery note. The aromas carry over to the firm palate along with butterscotch and a mineral note but it doesn't have quite enough fruit richness to stand up to the dominant oak sensations.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of ripe (leaning almost overripe) apple, melon and orange peel are followed by medium-sweet fruit flavors. It needs more acid to stand it up.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Light floral and green apple aromas and ripe apple and peach flavors make this wine tasty and easy to like. It's medium-bodied and soft on the finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This is a relatively simple, fruity quaff, filled to the brim with pears, apples and melons. It's medium-bodied, with a bit of apple- or pear-skin texture that gives it additional interest. Drink now.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Some richness and heft separate this wine from the pack, as it carries ripe white cherry and peach flavors on its soft but just-crisp-enough texture. Its medium to full body gives it a mouth-filling presence.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This 100% Pinot Grigio opens with aromas of lemon, green apple and white peach that carry over to the juicy palate along with an almond note. Bright acidity gives it a refreshing finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This opens with aromas of chamomile flower and ripe Bartlett pear. The lively easy-drinking palate offers green apple, white peach and a juicy citrus note alongside tangy acidity.

name: Bandit NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: White spring flower and apple aromas lead the way on this enjoyable white. The soft fresh palate doles out ripe Bartlett pear, citrus and a hint of mineral that lifts the finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Enticing scents of chamomile, white spring flower and white stone fruit mingle together in the glass. The creamy full-bodied palate doles out ripe honeydew melon, juicy yellow pear and nectarine zest while a ginger note adds depth. A far cry from the many bland Pinot Grigios that flood the market, this one is loaded with personality.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Here's a savory Pinot Grigio that's loaded with character, offering inviting aromas of white spring flower and ripe orchard fruit. The round, medium-bodied palate has just enough weight, doling out ripe Bartlett pear, creamy yellow apple and a hint of juicy tangerine while an energizing mineral note closes the finish.

name: Wilridge 2014 Dessert Wine Estate Wilridge Vineyard Pinot Gris (Naches Heights)
description: Aromas of wilted white flowers and ground herbs are followed by off-dry drinking fruit flavors, with peanut shell notes on the finish.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Clean floral, river stone and Asian pear aromas make for an inviting nose on this wine. There is moderate tension on the palate, where rounded Gala apple flavors meet with honeysuckle, jasmine and grapefruit pith.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This is a light easy-drinking style that fills the quaffable white wine bill quite nicely. It's lemony and tart, with a slice of orange peel for extra interest.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This is a dry, relatively austere wine. It showcases aromas of wet stone and lemon thyme, followed by flavors of pineapple and lemon and a long, citrusy finish. Drink now.

name: Carlton Cellars 2018 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: Zesty lime and pineapple notes lend revitalizing acidity to this fresh, thirst-quenching Pinot Grigio. It's moderate in body, with a lean, steely finish. Drink now through 2019.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Plump and mouthfilling, this easy, peachy Pinot Grigio offers forward fruit in a bold yet balanced package. It's a bit dense in body, but crisp acidity refreshes the midpalate. The finish is bright with tangerine notes. Drink now through 2019.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: Surprisingly silky on the palate, this approachable but elegant Pinot Grigio is a great value. Its punchy tangerine and lemon flavors are crisp and widely appealing, but there's also a nuanced slick of minerality on the midpalate. Drink now through 2019.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This has medicinal herb and adhesive bandage aromas that carry over to the lean palate. Racy acidity and a bitter note give it a firm, brisk finish.

name: Holm Oak 2017 Pinot Gris (Tasmania)
description: White spring flower and orchard fruit aromas lead the nose. The lean, rather evolved palate still retains fresh acidity, but drink soon to capture the remaining yellow apple and lemon peel flavors.

name: Stemmari 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: The aromas are barely a whisper, with notes of citrus and herb. It drinks dry with lightly concentrated fruit flavors. The variety seems hard to find.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This opens with subdued, mature yellow apple, acacia and almond aromas that carry over to the abrupt, tangerine-inflected palate. It has a lean, bitter finish.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This assertive, dry wine has wet stone and cured meat aromas and tart, mouth-cleansing grapefruit and pineapple flavors. It will make a fine foil for rich foods like fettucine alfredo or fried chicken.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This straightforward white has a shy nose, while the lean, simple palate suggests green apple and lemon. Firm acidity gives it a crisp, refreshing finish.

name: Anaya 2017 Potrero Vineyards Pinot Gris (Clements Hills)
description: This wine's oak and butterscotch aromas follow through to the lean palate, along with hints of toasted nut. Although linear and focused, it doesn't have enough fruit richness to stand up to the evident oak.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Crunchy fresh pears and white grapefruit abound in this pert fruity Pinot Grigio. Despite its light body, it's expansive and silken on the palate, finishing on a crisp lemon-drop tone. Drink now through 2019 to maximize its fresh appeal.

name: Alexana 2018 Terroir Series Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: This is a challenging wine, but it takes bravery to make Pinot Grigio like a red wine, using amphorae and terra cotta along the way. It's pink, but not a rose. Zesty aromas of tangerine, wet stone and grapefruit skins also show a bit of yeast. There is strong kumquat tang to the sip, which is fairly sour without the ripeness one might expect from the color.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Citrus blossom and orchard fruit aromas lead the way. On the round, medium-bodied palate, tangy acidity supports ripe yellow apple and pear flavors. A hint of citrus zest marks the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This wine's citrus blossom and ripe orchard fruit aromas lead to a tangy palate. Round and savory, it doles out creamy green apple, white peach and tangerine drop flavors.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This opens with subdued aromas that evoke dried yellow flower and overripe citrus peel. The aromas carry over to the lean brisk palate along with suggestions of lemon, bitter yellow-apple skin and an unusual funky hint of crushed black olive.

name: Feudo Arancio 2018 Pinot Grigio (Sicilia)
description: This wine has light citrus aromas and flavors of grapefruit, tangerine and yellow peach. Pleasant fruit sweetness marks the finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Subdued aromas of yellow flower, orchard fruit and a whiff of nut lift out of the glass. The palate seems rather evolved, offering suggestions dried citrus zest and a hint of baked yellow apple. It closes on a bitter almond note.

name: Landshut 2017 Pinot Grigio (Pfalz)
description: Delicate orchard fruit and hawthorn scents drift out of the glass in this wine. The light, vibrant palate offers green apple and white peach flavors framed by racy acidity, finishing crisp and refreshing.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Melon, baking spices and citrus pith come together in this medium- to full-bodied wine that finishes with a slightly bitter edge. Drink up.

name: Terlato 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This is a fruity, tropical rendition of grape, showing guava, papaya, coconut and apple aromas on the nose. The palate packs loads of floral character, with more tropical fruit and bubblegum-like flavors that feel ripe but not sweet.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Ripe orchard fruit and pressed yellow flower aromas lead the nose while the medium-bodied palate offers yellow apple and pear flavors. A hint of orange zest lends a tangy finish.

name: Terlato 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: White spring flower, ripe pear and grilled herb aromas take center stage in this medium-bodied white. The bright, linear palate offers green apple and citrus flavors, with a hint of clove.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Hay, pressed yellow flower and hazelnut aromas lead the nose in this deeply hued wine. The nutty note carries over to the evolved palate, with fennel and candied citrus zest flavors. It still boasts fresh acidity despite its age, but drink now to enjoy the remaining fruit.

name: A to Z 2018 Pinot Gris (Oregon)
description: This wine has a personality that's both crisp and satisfying. White pepper and light earth aromas lead to tempting peachy flavors and an appealing texture that balances tanginess and richness. The blend includes small portions of Chardonnay, Albariño, Gewürztraminer and Orange Muscat.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Mild peach skin and apricot aromas precede fresh and vivid white peach flavors in this dry, refreshing wine. It's well balanced, has enough concentration to keep it interesting and will be very versatile with food.

name: Punt Road 2018 Airlie Bank Gris Fermented on Skins Pinot Gris (Yarra Valley)
description: Subdued aromas of pressed acacia flower, hay and beeswax take shape in the glass. The mature palate offers ripe yellow apple and a hint of citrus zest alongside a note of toasted almond. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit and freshness.

name: Pierre Sparr 2017 Mambourg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: This copper-colored Pinot Grigio (a result of brief skin contact) offers subdued aromas suggesting yellow flower, toasted nut and citrus zest. Aged in barriques, the linear, rather lean palate offers oak, coconut, lemon and a note of bitter nut while a saline note wraps up the finish. Not your typical Pinot Grigio for sure.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This opens with aromas of sunbaked earth, warm hay and crushed stone. The ripe round palate shows mature golden apple, ripe Bartlett pear and a hint of saline while a note of white almond marks the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of white spring flower, acacia and ripe orchard fruit take center stage while the round medium-bodied palate doles out candied nectarine slices and golden apple.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Streaks of lime and tart green apple lend an acidic edge to this light-bodied Pinot Grigio. Dry in style, its concentrated palate suggests savory apple and pear edged with earth and bramble.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Fresh apple, lemon and peach notes are shaded by darker tones of dusty mineral and struck flint in this medium-bodied Pinot Grigio. It's a bit closed in profile, but refreshing and dry with an invigorating lime finish.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: There's the ever-so-slight touch of pink to the glass in this bottling by Bruno D'Alfonso, who packs strong and fresh aromas of cider apples, chalk, tangerine zest, pear flesh and light jasmine on the nose. There is tons of energy on the palate, tightening up before unleashing poached Asian pear, lime spritzer and red apple flavors.

name: AVA Grace 2018 Citrus Pear Vibrant Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Slight apple aromas are found on this fading Pinot Gris that's feeling flat and syrupy. Melon and pear flavors are a touch bitter on the finish.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Floral and stony in minerality, this is a delightful affordable quaff that's waxy in peach and apricot. Fleshy and lushly soft, it should please a wide range of palates in its easygoing approachability.

name: Windchaser 2017 Pinot Gris (Anderson Valley)
description: Pressed hawthorn, mature orchard fruit and a whiff of aromatic herb lead the nose. Round and savory, the full-bodied palate offers creamy yellow apple, juicy pear and a hint of crystallized ginger. It's balanced, with just enough freshness and a lingering finish.

name: Schmitt & Carrer 2015 Wineck-Schlossberg Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: Delicate alluring scents suggesting ripe orchard fruit and Spanish broom lead the nose on this subtle elegant white. On the bright balanced palate, notes of beeswax and mineral underscore Bartlett pear and yellow apple. It boasts impressive harmony and freshness for what was an extremely hot vintage.

name: Bandit NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description: This full-bodied Pinot Grigio offers aromas of sunbaked soil, hay, mature apple and dried herb. The rounded palate offers yellow apple and orange zest alongside soft acidity while a light mineral note lifts the finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of lemon zest, lemongrass and lime juice prepare the palate for flavors of freshly squeezed grapefruit juice, tart apple and white peach. The finish is brisk and pleasantly acidic.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Made with prolonged contact between the grape skins and the must, this copper-colored wine has pronounced aromas of orchard fruit, spring blossom and wild berry. The bright medium-bodied palate delivers McIntosh apple, white cherry and tangerine zest alongside tangy acidity. Dried herb signals the close.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: This opens with delicate aromas reminiscent of white spring flower and a whiff of orchard fruit. On the palate, fresh acidity underscores creamy Bartlett pear and nectarine zest that lead to a clean, bright finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: White spring flower, white stone fruit and a whiff of crushed stone come together on this. Bright and savory, the medium-bodied palate presents ripe Bartlett pear, golden apple and tangerine zest while a hint of aromatic herb wraps up the finish.

name: Terlato 2018 Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Partly fermented and aged in 500-liter French barrels, this opens with aromas of toasted oak, bread crust, acacia and sage. The rounded medium-boded palate offers mature yellow-apple skin, pineapple and a hint of butterscotch while a nutty note closes the finish.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: One of Friuli Venezia Giulia's little known denominations, the Carso growing zone, with its rocky soil, is turning out some fine whites like this elegant Pinot Grigio. Round, creamy but also loaded with finesse, it delivers aromas and flavors of ripe pear, creamy apple and juicy lemon while a stony mineral note graces the finish.

name: Eden Rift 2018 Terraces Pinot Gris (Cienega Valley)
description: Lush texture meets crisp acidity in this full-figured exploration of ripe peach and pear. Nutty and quietly floral, it ends in a voluptuous finish of smoky spice.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Almost as clear as water in the glass, this bottling offers aromas of honeysuckle, sweetgrass and nectarine syrup. It tightens up on the sip, with margarita-like flavors of lime and sea salt as well as an intriguing popcorn touch. Quite refreshing.

name: Due Palme 2018 Grisè Pinot Grigio (Puglia)
description: Aromas suggesting damp earth and crushed gravel lead the nose while the extremely diluted, short palate shows the barest hint of lemon juice. This is about as basic as a wine can be.

name: Finca la Celia 2018 Reserva Pinot Grigio (Uco Valley)
description: This wine is frankly old and downsliding, with aromas of pumpkin and corn flakes. A gold color and mildly oxidized apple-like flavors are tired.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Crisp and pungent, this has penetrating aromas of cut apple. Flavors resemble fresh, unfermented apple cider. There's a touch of bitterness in the finish.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: A rich texture and good, fruity flavors make this light-bodied, low-alcohol wine easy to enjoy. Apple and white peach aromas meet apple flavors and a soft mouthfeel.

name: Wine Cube 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Aromas of ripe apple, sliced pear and white flowers lead to tart, lighter-side-of-medium-bodied fruit flavors. Spices notes fill out the finish. It delivers easy-drinking enjoyment and is very varietal.

name: Fox Meadow 2018 Pinot Grigio (Virginia)
description: Extremely light in color and shy on the nose, this is closer to water than wine. The flavors are also faint, recalling only slight touches of red apple and pear.

name: SeaGlass 2018 Pinot Grigio (Central Coast)
description: Quite light aromas of apple and flower blossom are followed by sleek fruit flavors. The concentration seems a bit light.

name: Colutta 2018 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Clean yellow apple, scratched yellow-grapefruit skin and minerally cement-laced notes make for a grippy nose on this light and fresh bottling. Light stonefruit flavors meet with lime zest on the tasty, straightforward sip, proving quite refreshing all around.

name: Three Thieves 2018 Pinot Grigio (California)
description: Lemon zest, citrus blossoms and peach aromas lead the way to tropical fruit flavors in this Romanian Pinot Grigio. It is light bodied with a crisp finish.

name: Laurelwood 2017 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description: From a Lovall Valley location, this light white is intense in pear and peach, with a nuttiness to the strong, viscous foundation of oak. It finishes crisply like a twist of lime.

name: Joseph Mellot 2016 L'Original  (Sancerre)
description: From consulting winemaker Heidi Barrett, this is a beautiful wine, which was given time in both stainless steel and French oak. Sublime elements of peach, lemon zest and stone highlight a voluptuously grippy and lush structure.

name: Highway 12 2018 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
description: Prickly white fruit aromas lean toward cactus and citrus. In the mouth, this is punchy and citric. Briny citrus flavors finish clean and steady. Beyond that, there's nothing more to this good but basic Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Rutherford Ranch 2018 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description: This medium-bodied wine offers plenty of varietal character in the grassy snap-pea aromas and tangy fruit flavors that come with a crisp texture.

name: Highway 12 2018 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
description: This Sauvignon is pale hued, almost colorless and still young. It's muted and a bit reductive at first, but quickly reveals delicate guava, lychee, grass and jalapeño characters. The palate is slippery, zesty and restrained. This is no fruit bomb, but it's also not underripe and overly green.

name: Highway 12 2018 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
description: A juicy, easy-drinking wine that checks all the New Zealand Sauvignon boxes. Heady aromas of peach, grapefruit and grass are followed by prickly acidity, a chalky texture and oodles of ripe, peachy fruit.

name: Te Pa 2019 Pa Road Estate Grown Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
description: Flinty in stone, green apple and pear, this white has a thick backbone of structure and acidity, presenting as fleshy, full-bodied and fulsome on the lengthy palate.

name: Mettler Family Vineyards 2016 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
